# Nano Banana
> A concise hub for a new text‑guided image editing model. We publish reproducible benchmarks, prompt recipes, and 5‑minute quickstart guides. Compare with FLUX Kontext on common editing tasks.

Nano Banana focuses on practical, reproducible image editing workflows and side‑by‑side comparisons. Static, fast, SEO‑friendly.

## Core Content
- [Home](https://nano-banana.live/): Overview, CTA to try in LMArena, latest content
- [Benchmarks](https://nano-banana.live/benchmarks/): Fixed inputs/params for reproducible comparisons
- [Portrait Editing Benchmark](https://nano-banana.live/benchmarks/portrait-editing.html): A/B slider, pipeline, params
- [Quickstart](https://nano-banana.live/guides/quickstart.html): Colab and Local routes to first edit
- [Prompts](https://nano-banana.live/prompts/): Copy‑ready prompts with suggested params

## Common Resources
- [FAQ](https://nano-banana.live/faq.html): Answers to common questions and limits
- [About](https://nano-banana.live/about.html): Site purpose and credits

## Optional
- LMArena entry: https://lmarena.ai/?chat-modality=image
- OG image: https://nano-banana.live/og.svg
